content:
Sure, here are 25 more risks:

| Name of Risk | Explanation of What Can Go Wrong | Risk Severity (1-10) | Category |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Structural damage from earthquakes | Earthquakes can cause severe damage to the home's structure and foundation, leading to costly repairs or even making the home uninhabitable | 7 | Other |
| Water damage from faulty gutters | Faulty gutters can cause water to overflow and damage the home's structure, walls, and foundation, leading to expensive repairs or replacements | 7 | Roofing and Gutters |
| Fire damage from combustible materials | Combustible materials, such as paper or chemicals, can catch fire and cause severe damage to the home and personal belongings, and pose a significant risk to the occupants of the home | 7 | Fire Prevention |
| Pest infestations from cracks and gaps | Cracks and gaps in the home's structure can provide entry points for pests, such as rodents or insects, which can be costly to remove and cause damage to the home and personal belongings | 7 | Pest Control |
| Water damage from faulty plumbing | Faulty plumbing can cause water damage to the home's structure, floors, and personal belongings, leading to expensive repairs or replacements | 7 | Plumbing |
| Electrical damage from power surges | Power surges can damage electrical devices and components, such as computers or HVAC systems, which can be costly to repair or replace | 7 | Electrical |
| Water damage from frozen pipes | Frozen pipes can burst and cause water damage to the home's structure, floors, and personal belongings, leading to expensive repairs or replacements | 7 | Plumbing |
| Mold growth from high humidity | High humidity levels can cause mold growth, which can cause health problems for the occupants of the home, and be costly to remove | 7 | HVAC |
| Water damage from leaky plumbing fixtures | Leaky plumbing fixtures, such as faucets or toilets, can cause water damage to the home's structure, floors, and personal belongings, leading to expensive repairs or replacements | 7 | Plumbing |
| Fire damage from smoking | Smoking indoors can cause house fires, which can cause severe damage to the home and personal belongings, and pose a significant risk to the occupants of the home | 6 | Fire Prevention |
| Water damage from faulty sump pump | A faulty sump pump can cause water to accumulate in the home's basement or crawl space, causing water damage to the home's structure, floors, and personal belongings, leading to expensive repairs or replacements | 6 | Seasonal Preparation |
| Structural damage from poor soil condition | Poor soil condition around the foundation can cause it to shift or crack, leading to structural damage to the home | 6 | Landscaping and Drainage |
| Water damage from poor attic ventilation | Poor attic ventilation can cause moisture buildup, which can lead to water damage, mold growth, and other issues | 6 | Insulation and Weatherproofing |
| Fire damage from candles | Candles can cause house fires if they are not monitored or placed too close to flammable materials, leading to severe damage to the home and personal belongings | 6 | Fire Prevention |
| Structural damage from tree roots | Tree roots can grow into the home's foundation or pipes, causing structural damage or blockages that can be costly to repair | 6 | Landscaping and Drain |
